title: Banner
description: A reusable content type for banner content

img.title: Image
img.description: The background image for the banner

contentImg.title: Content Image
contentImg.description: The image to display with the textual content for this banner

subheader.title: Subheader
subheader.description: Sub header text for the banner

button.title: Link / Button
button.description: The action link / button for the banner

alignment.title: Horizontal Alignment
alignment.description: Alignment of the text content in the banner (left/right/center). Default is left

valignment.title: Vertical Alignment
valignment.description: Alignment of the text content in the banner (top/middle/bottom). Default is middle

percH.title: Horizontal alignment percentage
percH.description: A value between 0 and 100 (e.g. 30) Default is 0 (left).  Set horizontal alignment to None.

percV.title: Vertical alignment percentage
percV.description: A value between -50 and 50 (e.g. 30) Default is 0 (middle).  Set vertical alignment to None

hideBG.title: Hide Overlay
hideBG.description: Hide Overlay behind banner info. Default is false

stackMobileLayout.title: Stack Mobile Layout
stackMobileLayout.description: Enable to allow banner text to stack underneath the image on small screens. Default is false

analyticsEventLabel.title: Analytics Event Label
analyticsEventLabel.description: Textual description of the campaign used to group analytics

headerFontColor.title: Header Font Color
headerFontColor.description: Enter a value for font color. i.e FFFFFF, blue

headerFontBackground.title: Header Font Background Highlight
headerFontBackground.description: Enter a value for font color. i.e FFFFFF, blue

subheaderFontColor.title: Subheader Font Color
subheaderFontColor.description: Enter a value for font color. i.e FFFFFF, blue

descriptionFontColor.title: Description Font Color
descriptionFontColor.description: Enter a value for font color. i.e FFFFFF, blue

overlayColor.title: Overlay Color
overlayColor.description: Enter a value for the overlay color i.e FFFFFF, blue
